Yoga Retreat

  • By Devvrat
  • June 18, 2017
  • No Comments

 

 

Escape the daily grind and join one of our Yoga, Ayurveda & Meditation retreats. Relax, unwind, and rejuvenate in a calm atmosphere surrounded by nature.

Find back to yourself with Yoga and meditation, cleanse your body from toxins with Ayurvedic treatments, and unblock stuck energy with Pranayama and full body massage.

During our retreat you will find maximum relaxation, recharge for your daily life, and create a lot of positive vibes and energy for yourself. Most of all you will learn how to keep this energy once back home.

Next to your daily practice during the retreat, we will work out certain Asana sequences, as well as Pranayama, and Meditation techniques which you can continue practicing by yourself. The establishment of a regular self-practice is the key to long-term well-being and health. We will teach you and support you not only during, but also after your retreat.

Click here for more info on upcoming retreats & registration

Yoga & Ayurveda Retreat In Varkala Kerala India
